title: Reventador Volcano Volcanic Ash Advisory: DISCRETE VA EMS to 21000 ft (6400 m)
text: Reventador Volcano Volcanic Ash Advisory: DISCRETE VA EMS to 21000 ft (6400 m) Fri, 29 Dec 2023, 12:45 12:45 PM | BY: VNExplosive activity continues. Volcanic Ash Advisory Center (VAAC) Washington warned about a volcanic ash plume that rose up to estimated 21000 ft (6400 m) altitude or flight level 210 . The full report is as follows: FVXX23 at 12:40 UTC, 29/12/23 from KNES VA ADVISORY DTG: 20231229/1238Z VAAC: WASHINGTON VOLCANO: REVENTADOR 352010 PSN: S0004 W07739 AREA: ECUADOR SUMMIT ELEV: 11686 FT [3562 M] ADVISORY NR: 2023/873 INFO SOURCE: GOES-16. WEBCAM. NWP MODELS. ERUPTION DETAILS: DISCRETE VA EMS OBS VA DTG: 29/1210Z OBS VA CLD: SFC/FL210 S0005 W07747 - S0009 W07746 - S0010 W07749 - S0006 W07750 - S0005 W07747 MOV SW 20KT FCST VA CLD +6HR: 29/1800Z SFC/FL210 S0004 W07740 - S0005 W07739 - S0017 W07752 - S0009 W07756 - S0004 W07740 FCST VA CLD +12HR: 30/0000Z NO VA EXP FCST VA CLD +18HR: 30/0600Z NO VA EXP RMK: VA EMS OBS IN WEBCAM AND STLT IMG MOV SW EXT APPRX 10NM FM SUMMIT. SW MVMT EXP THRU T+6. FL AND MVMT BASED ON STLT AND NWP MODELS. ...GATLING NXT ADVISORY: WILL BE ISSUED BY 20231229/1845Z - All news about: [Reventador volcano](reventador/news.html) - Information about: [Reventador volcano](reventador.html) Previous news Thu, 28 Dec 2023, 18:00 [Reventador Volcano Volcanic Ash Advisory: NO VA EMS](reventador/news/229910/Reventador-Volcano-Volcanic-Ash-Advisory-NO-VA-EMS-.html) Thu, 28 Dec 2023, 06:15 [Reventador Volcano: sporadic emissions of volcanic ash](reventador/news/229869/Reventador-Volcano-sporadic-emissions-of-volcanic-ash.html) Show more
